languages.text: {n}Вигдис никак не реагирует на слова арбитра.{/n} "Я честно несу свою службу и подчинюсь воле Лорд-капитана, какова бы она ни была".
{n}Vigdis does not react in any way to the Arbitrator's words.{/n} "I do my duty honourably and will obey the Lord Captain's will, whatever it may be."
languages.original_text: {n}Вигдис никак не реагирует на слова арбитра.{/n} "Я честно несу свою службу и подчинюсь воле Лорд-капитана, какова бы она ни была".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis does not react in any way to the Arbitrator's words.{/n} "I do my duty honourably and will obey the Lord Captain's will, whatever it may be."

{n}Vigdis does not react in any way to the Arbitrator's words.{/n} "I do my duty honourably and will obey the Lord Captain's will, whatever it may be."

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスはアービトレイターの言葉に何の反応も示さなかった。{/n}「私は誇りをもって職務を全うしています。ロード・キャプテンのご命令がいかなるものであろうと、従うつもりです」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis does not react in any way to the Arbitrator's words.{/n} "I do my duty honourably and will obey the Lord Captain's will, whatever it may be."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスはアービトレイターの言葉に何の反応も示さなかった。{/n}「私は誇りをもって職務を全うしています。ロード・キャプテンのご命令がいかなるものであろうと、従うつもりです」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, Yargıcı'nın sözlerine hiçbir şekilde karşılık vermiyor.{/n} "Ben görevimi layıkıyla yerine getiriyorum. Lord Kaptan benden ne dilerse onu yapacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis does not react in any way to the Arbitrator's words.{/n} "I do my duty honourably and will obey the Lord Captain's will, whatever it may be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis, Yargıcı'nın sözlerine hiçbir şekilde karşılık vermez.{/n} "Ben görevimi layıkıyla yerine getiriyorum ve Lord Kaptan benden ne dilerse onu yapacağım."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis no reacciona a las palabras del Arbitrator.{/n} «Cumpliré mi deber con honor y haré la voluntad de mi Lord Capitán, sea cual sea».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis does not react in any way to the Arbitrator's words.{/n} "I do my duty honourably and will obey the Lord Captain's will, whatever it may be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis no reacciona a las palabras del Arbitrator.{/n} «Cumpliré mi deber con honor y haré la voluntad de mi Lord Capitán, sea cual sea».

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯对索罗蒙的指控没有任何反应。{/n}“我始终光荣地履行我的职责。舰长大人下达的一切命令，我都会忠实执行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis does not react in any way to the Arbitrator's words.{/n} "I do my duty honourably and will obey the Lord Captain's will, whatever it may be."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯对索罗蒙的指控没有任何反应。{/n}“我始终光荣地履行我的职责。舰长大人下达的一切命令，我都会忠实执行。”

languages.text: {n}Vigdis ne réagit pas en entendant les paroles de l'arbitrator.{/n} « J'effectue mon devoir de manière honorable et j'obéis toujours aux ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, quels qu'ils soient. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis does not react in any way to the Arbitrator's words.{/n} "I do my duty honourably and will obey the Lord Captain's will, whatever it may be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis ne réagit pas en entendant les paroles de l'arbitrator.{/n} « J'effectue mon devoir de manière honorable et j'obéis toujours aux ordres {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, quels qu'ils soient. »

languages.text: {n}Vigdis reagiert in keiner Weise auf die Worte des Arbitrators.{/n} "Ich erfülle ehrenhaft meine Pflicht und gehorche dem Willen des Lord Captains uneingeschränkt."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis does not react in any way to the Arbitrator's words.{/n} "I do my duty honourably and will obey the Lord Captain's will, whatever it may be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis reagiert in keiner Weise auf die Worte des Arbitrators.{/n} "Ich erfülle ehrenhaft meine Pflicht und gehorche dem Willen des Lord Captains uneingeschränkt."
